name: Image Panels
author: LCDPossible Team
description: Animated GIF and image sequence panels for LCDPossible

panelTypes.description: Plays animated GIF files or URLs with full animation support
panelTypes.helpText:
Displays animated GIF files with automatic frame timing.

Supported sources:
- Local file paths (absolute or relative)
- HTTP/HTTPS URLs
- Network shares (Windows UNC paths)

The GIF is automatically scaled to fit the display while maintaining aspect ratio.
Frame timing is preserved from the original GIF.

Tip: Use high-quality GIFs at or near your LCD resolution for best results.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path to the GIF file or URL

examples.description: Play a GIF from a URL
Play a GIF for 60 seconds then advance to next panel

panelTypes.description: Plays a sequence of numbered images from a folder at 30fps
panelTypes.helpText:
Plays a folder of numbered images as an animation.

File naming conventions supported:
- frame001.png, frame002.png, ...
- image_0001.jpg, image_0002.jpg, ...
- 001.png, 002.png, ...

Supported image formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, GIF (static)

Images are sorted alphanumerically and played at 30fps.
The sequence loops continuously.

Tip: Export animations from video editing software as image sequences for smooth playback.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Path to folder containing numbered image files

examples.description: Play images from a folder as animation
Play for 2 minutes then move to next panel
